column5: I was just thinking about the last four years as a member of the OFC. How many people have come here, be it lurker or member, and learned how to fish on this board? must be thousands
I joined back in September, and I know that I have learned TONS from this site!!!
This is my 6th year and owe the OFC for meeting alot of good people.. Yer not included in that Squirt!!!!!! Robin
Love you too, Robin

I was one of the first members of this board...  lol.. and I have learned alot ...  like how to press a tutu... what a snook is... manboobs... and what big hearts good people have (especially when they take the whiskey bottle outta my hand at g2g's)  .. of course they most likely do that for thier own safety....

I'm just starting to learn, but that is half the fun. I am by nature a "sponge" and when I jump into a hobby I research it like crazy trying to soak up all the info I can get my hands on. I think everyone here has helped me at least better my chances and as time continue hopefully the odds will continue to shift in my favor. Sure alot is opinion and conjecture, but realistically that's all science is with a few facts to back it up. What is great here is a there is such a wide range of experience and generally the "masters " are quite willing to help to greenhorns like myself. There is definetely a wealth of experience here. Thanks guys.
Thanks to OFC'rs I just learned   last week
Ah Gee Thanks Pete Buddy Ol Pal Robin
I don't remember when I joined, but it was two boards ago, and I remember there weren't anything like the number of members there are now.  I've definitely learned lots here...  Mike

Im still learning.  Some day though,some day.I,ll be as good as some of those pros,like CharlesN and JPD and Harrison,Terry.Yes Terry is a pro,dont let him fool you.  Just have to learn to keep my stick on the ice.   Squid your killing me.

WHAT?? are you kidding??..  .I learned everything I know(which isnt much)   about fishing from the WWW...I mean...EVERY one learned to fish with the internet or at least 3/4 of North America. Where you bin?     Where's Crazyhook??? LMAO..
judging from the resluts from last week some of the long time members need a refesher class for catching fish
My third year, learned lots  , met some great folks   and hopefully will be meeting more soon
What's with the Mr. in fornt of Eh?? You special or something
Nope they just wont let me be me I need 3 letters so as they say when yer this big they call ya Mr.
Never stop learning, once you think you have figured it out... you've only just begun!
Is that toad from this pass weekend Phil?  Very nice.
A good friend of mine  learned me to wear a belt when bendin over next to a White Oxford pickem up truck.Art
I dunno.. I still have trouble putting my underwear on right.
My brain hurts from all the aquatic education here.  I would still be a miserable hack if it wasn't for this place and the lost souls who have foolishly fished with me.
